MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G41 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in 14 Waverley Gardens. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:06am on Friday, 16 October 2020
